about_the_game:
The main character wants to have peaceful days again.
Fight to regain a castle that has been ruled by the enemy.
Defeat the enemies that appear one after another with your sword and overcome the traps to advance.
Defeat the six bosses lurking in the depths and restore peace.


Game description
It is a side-scrolling action game.
The player controls the player and defeats the enemies that appear one after another to advance.

The stage has a door for each room.
In order to pass through the door, the conditions must be cleared.
There are also traps on the stage, so you need to be careful.

Attack the approaching enemy.
It disappears when the damage exceeds a certain level.
By pressing the button repeatedly, you can attack up to 5 combos.


However, if a player takes more than a certain amount of damage, they will lose their equipment and clothing.

In the middle and at the end of the stage, there is a floor stage.
Movement on the floor stage is 3D, and you need to play with the camera.

If you advance to the end of the stage, you will be on the floor stage with a boss.
Here, if you defeat a certain number of enemies, a boss will appear.

If the boss takes more than a certain amount of damage, he will lose his equipment and costumes.

In other words, it's a battle of "undressing" vs. "undressing".

There are 6 stages, and each stage consists of multiple scenes.
Each time you clear a stage, you'll get enemy weapons and costumes.

Good luck!

This game is intended for an adult audience.

content_descriptors.notes:
There is a rendition in which the character collapses due to the attack.
Some characters take damage and become undressed and naked.
It is a costume that emphasizes breasts, buttocks and thighs.
Underwear is visible with intense movements and camera angles.
In special scenes, you can undress the character you have acquired.

name: KULOSHIRUMU

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit 10 / 11
  • Processor: i3 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX-1050Ti / resolution 1920x1080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The player controls the player and defeats the enemies that appear one after another to advance. It is a side-scrolling action game. Fight to reclaim a castle ruled by the enemy. The main character wants to have peaceful days again. Defeat the six bosses and regain your peace.
